title: [Ta'Illistim Keep, Antechamber]
description: Dominating the center of the chamber is a circular white marble fountain.  A majestic peacock with a colorful glass fanned-tail stands atop a center stone with water trickling down the sides into a pool surrounding the base.  The pale floor is broken by darker stones that create a walkway leading to a wide velvet-draped arch and a large opening.  Sunlight shimmers as it passes through a clear crystal dome above.
